Телемедицина

Great and fast service l!

In the middle of our vacation in Turkey we catch some viral disease. We just lost our voices and start coughing. About 13:00 I messaged to our Insurance agent, sent all necessary docs and about 17:00-18:00 we already have doctors in our apartments, despite we live in a rural area of Izmir. Doctors examined us, Wright a prescription for medicines. All of that was free of charge for us. But the strong point is the speed. Everybody react really quick. Doctors speak English. It’s 5 of 5 stars.

Саша Гажала August 24, 2022

I need to make urgent vaccine from…

I need to make urgent vaccine from tetanus, because of stepping on the rusty whistle. I was in other country and insurance company very quickly organised all the help for me, that I need. Thank you.

Ирина Круковская August 12, 2022

Great service

Hi! I had a medical issue while abroad. The reaction to my message to Ensuria support team followed in less than a minute and within 1.5 hour or so I already had an appointment with the doctor. The visit to the hospital was fully covered. I am satisfied with the service provided.

Olya Kravchuk September 23, 2022

Great service

I'm amazed at how quickly I was helped! Within an hour this agency made a local Indonesian clinic get in touch with me, and the clinic these guys work with was wonderful: clean, advanced; the doctor spoke great English and was really caring and gentle and explained me all I needed to know about my symptoms.

Alexandra Liubvina August 15, 2022

Звернулась із травмою ноги

Звернулась із травмою ноги, того ж дня надали допомогу у гарній клініці, ніби з американських серіалів, весь персонал знав англійську, був привітний. Зробили рентген, виписали ліки, додатково платити не довелося, рекомендую)

Savva Bogun September 14, 2022

Ми задоволені

Нашій дитині знадобилась медична допомога в Женеві. Компанія Ensuria направила нас в дуже непоганий лікарський заклад и заздалегідь забезпечила нас гарантійним листом від ассистанса. Завдяки цьому нас дуже швидко прийняв лікар. Представник компании був на постійному звʼязку в Телеграм, що було надзвичайно зручно, коли зʼявлялись запитання. Взагалі, ми задоволені роботою компанії.

Andrew Hak August 21, 2022

Why we are best in SEO?

The latest news, greatest tutorials and inspiration that’ll make you say “I wish I’d done that!” From incredible things you can make with Sketch, to insights from the people who make Sketch happen. Before you start writing a text you should have a clear idea of what you want to achieve with the text. Would you like to inform people or do they have to take action? Once you have determined the goal, you can write a focused text. If you choose a specific topic, it is advisable to focus your entire text on it and determine a relevant keyword. Find out what people look for in search engines and incorporate this keyword into your text. To make it easier for search engines to index the text, it’s a good idea to focus the text on one keyword instead of trying to process all kinds of keywords in a text. Also avoid the so-called ‘keyword stuffing’ where you use the keyword in every sentence. You must also pay attention to the length of the text. Search engines appreciate longer texts better than shorter texts. So try to write texts of at least 350-400 words that can be well indexed. As long as the content is interesting,
